entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
